name: Star Wars lightsaber deflect
description:
Star Wars- Lightsaber deflect

This is my first game that i've ever published (so its not very good) I hope you enjoy it.

You control a jedi who has been spotted by a stormtrooper and you must swing your lightsaber to protect yourself from his blaster bolt, the bolt gets faster over time and everytime you block it you get points try to see how high you can get your score!

 Note: I am currently not updating the game so there may be bugs!
